column5: Went to my Arrivecan app this afternoon and it automatically updated itself when I gave it permission. Can't finish registering until next week. Bobo from here on WC showed me that I can also put my (even less tech oriented than myself) traveling partner on the same app. That was mentioned earlier by someone here on WC. Just a passing thought. Pooch
So how does that work unless all that are on are in the same vehicle? Not, I'm guessing. Bill
We will be in the same truck crossing the border. Taking two trucks in case someone gets turned around at the border. Pooch
If not bumper to bumper,(maybe even then)probably better to have separate, sorta like fish limits,eh? (Fish have to be in vehicle of the person claiming the fish.) Bill
